author: Cameron Faulkner
title: Eero’s mesh Wi-Fi systems are more affordable than usual
description: Save on Eero’s mesh Wi-Fi routers at Amazon and Best Buy that expand internet coverage in your home. Also, Arlo’s Pro 3 home security cameras are discounted at Woot, and the big $200 discount on Samsung’s Galaxy S20 is still live.
